en: Adam, Seth, Enosh,
hmr: Adam, Seth, Enos;

en: Kenan, Mahalalel, Jared,
hmr: Kenan, Mahalalel, Jared;

en: Enoch, Methuselah, Lamech,
hmr: Enok, Methusela, Lamek;

en: Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
hmr: Noa, Sem, Ham le Japheth.

en: The sons of Japheth: Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.
hmr: Japheth naupasalhai chu; Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Mesek le Tira an nih.

en: And the sons of Gomer: Ashkenaz, and Diphath, and Togarmah.
hmr: Gomer naupasalhai chu: Aske- naz, Diphath le Togarma an nih.

en: And the sons of Javan: Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Rodanim.
hmr: Javan naupasalhai chu: Elisa, Tarsis, Kittim le Rodanim an nih.

en: The sons of Ham: Cush, and Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.
hmr: Ham naupasalhai chu: Kus, Mizraim, Put le Kanaan an nih.

en: And the sons of Cush: Seba, and Havilah, and Sabta, and Raama, and Sabteca. And the sons of Raamah: Sheba, and Dedan.
hmr: Chun, Kus naupasalhai chu: Seba, Havila, Sabta, Raama le Sabteka an nih. Raama naupasalhai chu: Seba le Dedan an nih.

en: And Cush begat Nimrod; he began to be a mighty one in the earth.
hmr: Kus chun Nimrod a nei a; hnuoia thilthawtheitak a hung ni ṭan tah a.

en: And Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,
hmr: Chun, Mizraim chun Ludim, Anamim, Lehabim, Naphtuhim,

en: and Pathrusim, and Casluhim (from whence came the Philistines), and Caphtorim.
hmr: Pathrusim, Kasluhim (Philistin mihai hung suokna chu) le Kaph- torim a nei a.

en: And Canaan begat Sidon his first-born, and Heth,
hmr: Chun, Kanaan chun a nau lutirah Zidon a nei a, chun, Heth;

en: and the Jebusite, and the Amorite, and the Girgashite,
hmr: Chun, Jebus mihai, Amor mihai, Girgas mihai;

en: and the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,
hmr: Hiv mihai, Ark mihai, Sin mihai;

en: and the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite.
hmr: Arvad mihai, Zemar mihai le Hamath mihai a nei a.

en: The sons of Shem: Elam, and Asshur, and Arpachshad, and Lud, and Aram, and Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Meshech.
hmr: Sem naupasalhai chu: Elam, Assur, Arpaksad, Lud, Aram, Uz, Hul, Gether le Mesek an nih.

en: And Arpachshad begat Shelah, and Shelah begat Eber.
hmr: Arpaksad chun Sela a nei a, Sela chun Eber a nei a.

en: And unto Eber were born two sons: the name of the one was Peleg; for in his days the earth was divided; and his brother’s name was Joktan.
hmr: Eber-a chun naupasal pahni an pieng a: a pakhat hming chu Peleg a nih; ama hun lai chun hnuoi hi ṭhein a um sih a; chun, a unaupa hming chu Joktan a nih.

en: And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,
hmr: Joktan chun Almodad, Seleph, Hazarmaveth, Jera;

en: and Hadoram, and Uzal, and Diklah,
hmr: Hadoram, Uzal, Dikla;

en: and Ebal, and Abimael, and Sheba,
hmr: Ebal, Abimael, Seba;

en: and Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab. All these were the sons of Joktan.
hmr: Ophir, Havila le Jobab a nei a. Hienghai po po hi Joktan naupasal- hai chu an nih.

en: Shem, Arpachshad, Shelah,
hmr: Sem, Arpaksad, Sela,

en: Eber, Peleg, Reu,
hmr: Eber, Peleg, Reu;

en: Serug, Nahor, Terah,
hmr: Serug, Nahor, Tera,

en: Abram (the same is Abraham).
hmr: Abram, (hi hi Abraham leh thu- hmun a nih);

en: The sons of Abraham: Isaac, and Ishmael.
hmr: Abraham naupasalhai chu Isak le Ismael.

en: These are their generations: the first-born of Ishmael, Nebaioth; then Kedar, and Adbeel, and Mibsam,
hmr: Hi hi an inthla dân chu a nih. Ismael nau lutîr chu Nebaioth a na; chun, Kedar hai, Adbeel hai, Mibsam hai;

en: Mishma, and Dumah, Massa, Hadad, and Tema,
hmr: Misma hai, Duma hai, Massa hai, Hadad hai, Tema hai,

en: Jetur, Naphish, and Kedemah. These are the sons of Ishmael.
hmr: Jetur hai, Naphis hai, Kedema hai. Hienghai hi Ismael naupasalhai chu an nih.

en: And the sons of Keturah, Abraham’s concubine: she bare Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak, and Shuah. And the sons of Jokshan: Sheba, and Dedan.
hmr: Chun, Abraham thaikêm Ke- tura naupasalhai chu: Zimran le, Joksan le, Medan le, Midian le, Isbak le Sua an nih. Chun, Joksan naupa- salhai chu: Seba, Dedan.

en: And the sons of Midian: Ephah, and Epher, and Hanoch, and Abida, and Eldaah. All these were the sons of Keturah.
hmr: Chun, Midian naupasalhai chu; Epha, Epher, Hanok, Abida, Eldaa an nih. Hieng po po hi Ketura naupa- salhai chu an nih.

en: And Abraham begat Isaac. The sons of Isaac: Esau, and Israel.
hmr: Chun, Abraham chun Isak a nei a; Isak naupasalhai chu: Esau le Israel.

en: The sons of Esau: Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jalam, and Korah.
hmr: Esau naupasalhai chu: Eliphaz, Reuel, Jeus, Jalam le Kora.

en: The sons of Eliphaz: Teman, and Omar, Zephi, and Gatam, Kenaz, and Timna, and Amalek.
hmr: Eliphaz naupasalhai chu: Teman, Omar, Zephi, Gatam, Kenaz, Timna le Amalek,

en: The sons of Reuel: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.
hmr: Reuel naupasalhai chu: Na- hath, Zera, Samma le Mizza.

en: And the sons of Seir: Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah, and Dishon, and Ezer, and Dishan.
hmr: Chun, Seir naupasalhai chu: Lotan, Sobal, Zibeon, Ana, Dison, Ezer le Disan.

en: And the sons of Lotan: Hori, and Homam; and Timna was Lotan’s sister.
hmr: Chun, Lotan naupasalhai chu: Hori le Homam. Timna chu Lotan farnu a nih.

en: The sons of Shobal: Alian, and Manahath, and Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. And the sons of Zibeon: Aiah, and Anah.
hmr: Sobal naupasalhai chu: Alian, Manahath, Ebal, Sephi le Onam. Chun, Zibeon naupasalhai chu: Aia le Ana.

en: The sons of Anah: Dishon. And the sons of Dishon: Hamran, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran.
hmr: Ana naupasal chu Dison. Dison naupasalhai chu: Hamran, Esban, Ithran le Keran.

en: The sons of Ezer: Bilhan, and Zaavan, Jaakan. The sons of Dishan: Uz, and Aran.
hmr: Ezer naupasalhai chu: Bilhan, Zaavan le Jaakan. Disan naupasalhai chu: Uz le Aran.

en: Now these are the kings that reigned in the land of Edom, before there reigned any king over the children of Israel: Bela the son of Beor; and the name of his city was Dinhabah.
hmr: Tuhin hienghai hi Edom ram- a lal rorêltuhai chu an nih, chu hmaa Israel thlahai chunga lal rorêltuhai chu: Bela, Beor naupa; a khawpui hming chu Dinhaba a nih.

en: And Bela died, and Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his stead.
hmr: Bela chu a thih a, Bozra-a Zera naupa Jobab chun ama aiin ro a rêl a.

en: And Jobab died, and Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his stead.
hmr: Chun, Jobab chu a thih a, ama aia chun Teman mihai rama um Husam chun ro a rêl a.

en: And Husham died, and Hadad the son of Bedad, who smote Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in his stead; and the name of his city was Avith.
hmr: Chun, Husam chu a thih a, ama aia chun Bedad naupa Hadad, Moab phaia Midianhai hnetu khan ro a rêl a; chun, a khawpui hming chu Avith a ni nghe ngheh a.

en: And Hadad died, and Samlah of Masrekah reigned in his stead.
hmr: Chun, Hadad chu a hung thih a, ama aia chun Masrekaa um Samla chun ro a rêl a.

en: And Samlah died, and Shaul of Rehoboth by the River reigned in his stead.
hmr: Chun, Samla chu a thih a, ama aia chun Vadungpui panga Reho- botha um Saul chun ro a rêl a.

en: And Shaul died, and Baal-hanan the son of Achbor reigned in his stead.
hmr: Chun, Saul chu a hung thih a, ama aia chun Akbor naupa Baal-hanan chun ro a rêl a.

en: And Baal-hanan died, and Hadad reigned in his stead; and the name of his city was Pai: and his wife’s name was Mehetabel, the daughter of Matred, the daughter of Me-zahab.
hmr: Chun, Baal-hanan chu a thih a, ama aia chun Hadadin ro a rêl a; a khawpui hming chu Pai a nih; chun, a nuhmei hming chu Mehetabel a na, ama chu Mezahab naunu, Matred naunu a nih.

en: And Hadad died. And the chiefs of Edom were: chief Timna, chief Aliah, chief Jetheth,
hmr: Chun, Hadad chu a thi a. Chun, Edom ram awptuhai chu: Timna, Alia, Jetheth,

en: chief Oholibamah, chief Elah, chief Pinon,
hmr: Oholibama, Ela, Pinon,

en: chief Kenaz, chief Teman, chief Mibzar,
hmr: Kenaz, Teman, Mibzar,

en: chief Magdiel, chief Iram. These are the chiefs of Edom.
hmr: Magdiel le Iram hai an nih. Hienghai hi Edom ram awptuhai chu an nih.
